text: ever wondered how agricultural Innovations changed the world it all started with the Quest for increased food production the answer lay in scientific advancements and hybrid seeds this revolution led to higher crop yields and reduced hunger but it also raised concerns about environmental impact despite the challenges the Green Revolution reshaped agriculture
